code: import axios from'axios';let newsletters;let boardMinutes;let audits;let meetingPDF;let rules;let calendar;const PDFService={getOwnersPDFs:async function(){const newslettersUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/newsletters?per_page=50");await axios.get(newslettersUrl).then(response=>{newsletters=response.data;});const boardMinutesUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/board_minutes?per_page=50");await axios.get(boardMinutesUrl).then(response=>{boardMinutes=response.data;});const auditsUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/audits?per_page=50");await axios.get(auditsUrl).then(response=>{audits=response.data;});const meetingPDFUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/meeting_pdfs");await axios.get(meetingPDFUrl).then(response=>{meetingPDF=response.data;});return{newsletters,boardMinutes,audits,meetingPDF};},getReservationPDFs:async function(){const rulesUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/rules");await axios.get(rulesUrl).then(response=>{rules=response.data;});const calendarUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/usage_calendars");await axios.get(calendarUrl).then(response=>{calendar=response.data;});return{rules,calendar};}};export default PDFService;
